text:
Adele, Kendrick to sing at Grammys

British singer Adele and acclaimed rapper Kendrick Lamar have made it to the initial list of artists scheduled to perform at the 58th annual Grammy award ceremony on February 15.

Lamar is this year’s most-nominated artist with 11 nods.

The Weeknd, up for seven awards this year, and Little Big Town, who won for ‘Pontoon’ three years ago and is currently nominated for four awards for ‘Girl Crush’, will also play. The Weeknd previously took the stage with Imagine Dragons in 2014. — PTI
title: ENT-GRAMMY
